about_the_game:
Street Defenders: Defend Your Neighborhood from the Zombie Horde!


In Street Defenders, you'll immerse yourself in a thrilling battle against the undead. Each level presents new challenges as you face increasingly intense zombie waves. The game features a diverse array of tower types including Archer Towers, Bomber Towers, Electric Towers, and Sniper Towers. Each tower comes with its unique abilities, allowing you to craft a defense strategy tailored to your play style.

Key Features:

  • Strategic Tower Placement: Choose from a range of towers to build and upgrade, including Archers, Bombers, Electric, and Snipers. Each tower type has its strengths and weaknesses, and it's up to you to place them wisely to maximize their effectiveness.
  • In-Game Currency: Earn coins by defeating zombies. Use these coins to upgrade your towers and unlock powerful new abilities. The more zombies you destroy, the stronger your defenses become!
  • Intense Zombie Waves: Face off against eight different types of zombies, each with unique traits and challenges. As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter increasingly difficult waves, testing your strategic skills and adaptability.
  • Dynamic Difficulty: The intensity of the zombie invasion grows with each level. Prepare for escalating challenges as you defend against more aggressive and numerous foes.
  • Power-Ups: Utilize various power-ups to gain the upper hand in tight situations. Whether you need an explosive boost or a temporary defense enhancement, power-ups are crucial for turning the tide in your favor.
  • Endless Waves of Zombies: The game doesn't just end with a few rounds. Prepare for an ongoing battle where the waves keep coming, and your strategy must evolve continuously to keep your neighborhood safe.

Gameplay Mechanics:

Street Defenders combines classic tower defense mechanics with modern gameplay features. Begin by placing your initial towers and then strategically upgrade them as you gather more coins. Each tower type has its role in the defense strategy:

  • Archer Towers this tower is equipped with a precise archer who fires sharp arrows at the invading enemies; it is effective against both ground and flying enemies.
  • Bomber Towers this tower launches a bomb that creates a significant impact within the explosion radius of ground zombies.
  • Electric Towers this tower launches a magical ball that creates a significant impact against both ground and aerial zombies.
  • Sniper Towers this tower features a soldier who uses a sniper rifle to take down ground and flying zombies.
  • As zombies advance through the path, you'll need to constantly adjust your strategy. Use your coins to enhance your towers, unlock new abilities, and deploy powerful power-ups to keep the undead at bay.

The Challenge Awaits:


Your goal is simple yet challenging: prevent the zombies from reaching the end of the path. Each time a zombie gets through, your health decreases. If your health is depleted, the game ends, and you'll have to start over. The key to success is to build a robust defense and adapt to the increasing difficulty of each level.

Why Play Street Defenders?


Street Defenders offers a captivating and addictive gameplay experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The combination of strategic tower placement, intense zombie waves, and various upgrade options creates a dynamic and engaging challenge. Whether you're a fan of tower defense games or new to the genre, Street Defenders provides an exciting and rewarding experience.

Download Street Defenders Today!


Are you ready to take on the zombie apocalypse and protect your neighborhood? Download Street Defenders now and put your strategic skills to the test. Show the world your defense prowess and become the ultimate commander in this epic tower defense battle!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory and support for OpenGL 2.0+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Street Defenders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 250 or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Street Defenders, is the ultimate tower defense game where strategic planning and quick reflexes are key to safeguarding your neighborhood from a relentless zombie invasion. As the commander, you hold the fate of your community in your hands. Your mission is to protect streets from waves of undead.
